sql.if: functionid, functionname, parentid, functionurl, description, sort, familyid, icon

mapper.select: select functionid,functionname,parentid,functionurl,description,sort,familyid,icon from jp_function where functionid = #{functionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and familyid = #{familyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into jp_function (functionid, functionname, parentid, functionurl, description, sort, familyid, icon) values (#{functionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{functionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{functionurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{familyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into jp_function
functionid,
functionname,
parentid,
functionurl,
description,
sort,
familyid,
icon,

mapper.update:
update jp_function
functionid = #{record.functionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
functionname = #{record.functionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentid = #{record.parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
functionurl = #{record.functionurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{record.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
familyid = #{record.familyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update jp_function set functionid = #{record.functionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, functionname = #{record.functionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentid = #{record.parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, functionurl = #{record.functionurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{record.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, familyid = #{record.familyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update jp_function
functionname = #{functionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
functionurl = #{functionurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
familyid = #{familyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where functionid = #{functionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update jp_function set functionname = #{functionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, functionurl = #{functionurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, familyid = #{familyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where functionid = #{functionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select fk.functionid, functionname, parentid, functionurl, icon, sort, description,func_role.functionid as isfunctionid from jp_function fk left join jp_func_role func_role on fk.functionid = func_role.functionid
and func_role.roleid = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and 1=2
where fk.familyid = #{familyid} order by fk.sort desc
